game.name: Beyond the Eyes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A 2d game with a view from above, where you are in the shoes of a blind protagonist and have to find a way to escape from a mansion by collecting various items scattered around it at random while being chased by a monster.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2d game with a view from above, where you are in the shoes of a blind protagonist and have to find a way to escape from a mansion by collecting various items scattered around it at random while being chased by a monster.
